title: can someone tell me what font is this.. or sinilar to this
author: herogilo

comments.content:
Please ask for IDs in the ID section.

hhp

Surpising, I didn't hit this with a quick run through of the usual categories for this type of font [techno, sci fi, futuristic, automotive etc.] either at Dafont or Myfonts. Hope someone finds it for you.  
Its not too difficult to make using Serpentine Sans ICG Bold Oblique  
 [http://www.myfonts.com/fonts/imageclub/serpentine-sans/](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317090416/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/imageclub/serpentine-sans/ "http://www.myfonts.com/fonts/imageclub/serpentine-sans/")  
Just delete the dots on i, thin the center horizontal stroke of s, fill in the ink traps, and the casual reader would probably not notice any difference.

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317090416im_/http:/typophile.com/files/SerpentineSansBoldObliqueEdited_3477.jpg)
  
A little additional work and you could have a perfect match.  
Don
Why do people keep asking for font IDs in the Critique section. How is that even slightly appropriate? I'm dealing with fury here.
